content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I think 790 Euro per month would be a fair price for the apartment. It's in a great location and very convenient.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 790 Euro is too low for me. I'm trying to get the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. How about 810 Euro per month? I believe this is a reasonable increase from my initial offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 810 Euro is still too low for me. I'm trying to get the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt, let's try 830 Euro per month. This should be more in line with the market value for such a centrally located apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 830 Euro is still too low for me. I'm trying to get the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I'm finding it difficult to meet your expectations. Would you be willing to accept 850 Euro per month as the final price? This is the highest I can go.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [850] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fantastic! We have agreed on a price of 850 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
